DOC.brief_summary: Main objective : To assess efficacy two antidepressant different pharmacological family : citalopram ( Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor , SSRI ) reboxetine ( Norepinephrine Reuptake inhibitor , NRI ) adjunct treatment risperidone olanzapine treatment negative symptom schizophrenia . Secondary objective : To assess efficacy citalopram reboxetine adjunct treatment risperidone olanzapine treatment cognitive symptom schizophrenia . To compare efficacy reboxetine citalopram adjunct treatment treatment negative cognitive symptom schizophrenia . Method : Multicentric , randomize double-blind clinical trial compare placebo six month follow-up . A total 249 patient diagnosis schizophrenia ( DSM-IV criterion ) significant negative symptom , recruit 9 participate centre . Variables : sociodemographic clinical variable ( PANSS , SANS , CGI global , GAF , LSP , Hamilton scale , BACS )
DOC.brief_title: Reboxetine Citalopram Adjunct Treatment Second Generation Antipsychotics Treatment Negative Symptoms Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis schizophrenia ( DSMIV criterion ) Stable dos antipsychotic medication ( olanzapine , risperidone ) least 60 day prior study initiation Presence significant negative symptom ( defined one negative symptom score grater 4 PANSS scale ) ( Kay 1987 ) Patients give write informed consent participate study Patients substance abuse/dependence diagnosis previous six month . Mental Retardation . Patients take antidepressant last 4 month trial . Patients take antipsychotic medication , except : sinquan 100 , Entumine 40 , Largactil 100 Seroquel 200 . Patients score 20 Hamilton Rating Scale Depression . Pregnancy lactation . Serious impaired kidney function . History hemorrhagic disorder . Reboxetine citalopram allergy .
